gameData

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameData.DataBase

  • public class DataBase
extends Object
    DataBase class that gives static access to important game data.
    Author:
    Marcin Szymkowiak

        See Also:

      • loadSavedGame

        public static void loadSavedGame(String filename)
                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                 XMLStreamException
        Loads game from given file. Calls methods: XMLhandler.loadGameParameters(java.lang.String) , XMLhandler.loadPlayer(java.lang.String) , XMLhandler.loadLecturers(java.lang.String), XMLhandler.loadCourses(java.lang.String) and XMLhandler.loadCalendar(java.lang.String) from Warning! Order of loading is important! Do not load Courses before Lecturers!
        Parameters:
        filename - Path to file. (file name included)
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException
        See Also:
        XMLhandler

      • lost

        public static void lost()
        Shows a window showing disgusted Star Treck character and a comment that player has just lost the game

        public static String[] randHangmanQuestion()
                                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                                           IOException
        Calls the static method from XMLhandler with the same name
        Returns:
        a password and definition set as a String array with size 2
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException
